GSP33brsgor1u:5807: veditanyaṃ priyaṃ vande prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ param //1//
GSP33brsgor1u:5809: ānumānikam apy ekeṣām iti cen na śarīra-rūpaka-vinyasta-gṛhīter darśayati ca / BBs_1,4.1 /
GSP33brsgor1u:5816: tenāśabdatvanirūpaṇena brahmaṇi vedāntānāṃ samanvayo dṛḍhīkṛto bhavatītyadhyāyasaṃgatirapyadhikaraṇatrayasya jñeyā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5818: tatkiṃ pradhānaparaṃ pūrvoktaśarīraparaṃ veti smṛtiprakaraṇābhyāṃ saṃśaye pūrvamaprasiddhabrahmaparatvaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:5821: tathā ca brahmapradhānayorvikalpena kāraṇatvāt brahmaṇyeva vedāntānāṃ samanvaya iti niyamāsiddhiḥ phalaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:5833: nanu śabdapratyabhijñāyāmartho 'pi pratyabhijñāyata ityāśaṅkya yaugikācchabdāsati niyāmake nārthaviśeṣadhīrityāha-sa ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5834: rūḍhyā taddhīrityāśaṅkya rūḍhiḥ kiṃ laukikī smārtā vā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5842: pūrvajñātarūpārthasya sthāne tadviruddhārthajñāne sati tasya dhīrnāstītyatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-na hīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5845: tasya pūrvavākye ātmabuddhyormadhyasthānapaṭhitasyātrāpi madhyasthenāvyaktaśabdena grahaṇānna pradhānasya vaidikatvamiti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5846: smārtakramaḥ kimiti tyaktavya ityāśaṅkya śrautakramasya prakaraṇādyanugraheṇa balavattvādityāha-kuta ityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5851: yadyavivekī tadā manoraśanābaddhāṃstān pravartayatīti manasaḥ pragrahatvaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5854: nanu svataścidātmano bhogasaṃbhavāt kiṃ rathādinetyata āha-ātmeti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5855: ātmā dehaḥ, dehādisaṅkakalpanayā bhoktṛtvaṃ na svato 'saṅgatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5857: śarīrasya prakṛtatve 'pyavyaktapadena pradhānaṃ gṛhyatāmityata āha-tatra ya eveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5863: tato grahebhyaḥ śreṣṭhā atigrahā viṣayā iti bṛhadāraṇyake śravaṇāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:5883: taduktau ca pradhānena kimaparāddhamityata āha-sā ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5885: pūrvaṃ vyaṣṭibuddhyabhedenoktātra tato bhedena paratvamucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5893: kiñca brahmātmaikatvaparatve granthe bhedavādināṃ pradhānasyāvakāśo nāstītyāha-śarīretyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5895: kāṭhakagranthasyaikyatātparye gūḍhatvajñeyatvajñānahetuyogavidhaye liṅgāni santītyāha-tathā caiṣa ityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:5943: kathaṃ tasya mahato jīvātparatvamityāśaṅkya dvitīyasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-tadadhīnatvācceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5947: avyaktapadabalāt prakṛtamapi sthūlaṃ tyajyata iti śaṅkate-āmnātasyeti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5949: tava mate tasyā abhāvātkutor'thabodha iti samādhatte-neti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5950: tāṃ vināpyarthathīḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-nahīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5951: śarīraśabdena rūḍhyā sthūlaṃ prakṛtaṃ tasya hāniraprakṛtasya bhūtasūkṣmasyāvyaktapadena grahaṇamanyāyyaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5954: ākāṅkṣayā vākyaikavākyatve sati prakṛtaṃ śarīradvayamavyaktapadena grāhyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:5959: sthūlasya dṛṣṭadaurgandhyādinā laśunādivadanātmatvadhīvairāgyayoḥ sulabhatvāditi śaṅkate-na ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5960: dṛṣṭā bībhatsā ghṛṇā yasmin tasya bhāvastattā tayetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5964: kintu vaiṣṇavaṃ paramaṃ padaṃ vivakṣitamiti taddarśanārthaṃ prakṛtaṃ sthūlamevāvyaktapadena grāhyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5965: kiñca sūkṣmasya liṅgāntaḥpātina indriyādigrahaṇenaiva grahaṇānna pṛthagavyaktaśarīrapadābhyāṃ grahaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5975: nahi śakyamiti ca vadadbhiḥ pradhānaṃ jñeyatvena smaryata iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5976: na kevalaṃ bhedapratiyogitvena pradhānasya jñeyatvaṃ tairiṣṭaṃ kintu tasyopāsanayāṇimādiprāptaye 'pītyāha-kvacicceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:5978: upadiṣṭaṃ hi jñānaṃ phalavaditi jñātuṃ śakyaṃ niṣphalasyopadeśāyogādavyaktasya ca jñānānupadeśātphalavajjñānagamyatvāsiddhirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5983: asmanmate viṣṇavākhyapadasyaikasyaiva jñeyatvāttaddarśanārthamavyaktapadena śarīropanyāso yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5984: sādhāraṇaśabdamātrānna pradhānasya pratyabhijñā smārtaliṅgasyānuktyā niyāmakābhāvāditi tātparyam //4//
GSP33brsgor1u:5987: vadatīti cen na prājño hi prakaraṇāt / BBs_1,4.5 /
GSP33brsgor1u:5993: trayāṇām eva caivam upanyāsaḥ praśnaś ca / BBs_1,4.6 /
GSP33brsgor1u:5995: mṛtyunā naciketasaṃ prati trīnvarānvṛṇīṣvetyukteḥ trayāṇāmeva praśno naciketasā kṛtaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:5999: he mṛtyo, sa mahyaṃ dattavarastvaṃ svargahetumagni smarasi /
GSP33brsgor1u:6005: yāḥ svarūpato yāvatīḥ saṃkhyāto yathā vā krameṇāgniścīyate tatsarvamuvācetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6006: hantedānīṃ brahma vakṣyāmīti brahmavākyena jīvapraśnādvyavahitanamapi 'yathā ca maraṇaṃ prāpya'ityādi vākyaṃ jīvaviṣayamuttaraṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:6008: vākyārthastu ātmā maraṇaṃ prāpya yathā bhavati tathā vakṣyāmīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6013: evaṃ ca trayāṇāmevopanyāsaḥ praśnaśca yataḥ ato na pradhānamavyaktamiti yojanā /
GSP33brsgor1u:6015: ekaḥ praśnaḥ dvau praśnau veti pakṣadvaye phalitaṃ pṛcchati-kiñcāta iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6018: praśnaikye sūtrāsaṃgatiḥ bhede pradhānasya śrautatvasiddhiriti pūrvavādyāha-sa evetyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:6024: itaḥ punaḥ martyalokaṃ prāptasya mama pitā yathāpūrvaṃ sumanāḥ syāditi prathamaṃ vavre /
GSP33brsgor1u:6025: nanu dvitīyavaro jīvavidyā tṛtīyo brahmavidyeti praśnabhedaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-yeyamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6026: prete ityupakramya tṛtīyatvoktiliṅgājjīvātmavidyaiva tṛtīyo vara ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6027: evaṃ vākyopakrame sati praśnāntaraṃ na yuktamityāha-tatreti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6028: maraṇadharmādyasparśaliṅgābhyāṃ praṣṭavyayorjīveśvarayorbhedāt praśnabhedasiddhervākyabādho yukta iti śaṅkate-nanvityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:6030: na kevalaṃ praṣṭavyabhedāt praśnabhedaḥ kintu praśnavākyayoḥ sādṛśyābhāvādapītyāha-praśnacchāyeti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6032: kiñca brahmāpraśne janmādiniṣedhena jīvasvarūpaṃ vadan yamastayoraikyaṃ sūcayatītyāha-iha cānyatreti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6040: yena sākṣiṇā pramātā paśyati tāmātmānamiti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6042: kiñcābhedamuktvā bhedasya ninditatvādabheda eva satya ityāha-tatheti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6044: evamihākhaṇḍaikarase brahmaṇi yo nāneva mithyābhedaṃ paśyati sa bhedadarśī maraṇānmaraṇaṃ prāpnoti saṃsārabhayānna mucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6045: kiñca jīvapraśnānantaraṃ 'taṃ durdarśam'iti yaduttaramuvāca tenāpyuttareṇābhedo gamyata iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6047: putrādikaṃ vṛṇīṣvetyukte 'pi viṣayāṃstucchīkṛtyātmajñānānna cacāla 'nānyaṃ tasmānnaciketā vṛṇīte'iti śravaṇāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:6048: tadā saṃtuṣṭo yamaḥ 'anyacchreyo 'nyadutaiva preyaḥ'iti bhogāpavargamārgayorvailakṣaṇyaṃ pratijñāya 'dūramete viparīte viṣūcī avidyā yā ca vidyā'iti darśitavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6054: yataḥ tvā tvāṃ bahavo 'pi kāmāḥ putrādayo mayā dīyamānā durlabhā api nālolupanta
GSP33brsgor1u:6055: lobhavantaṃ na kṛtavanta iti praṣṭāraṃ stutvā praśnamapi 'tvādṛṅgo bhūyānnaciketaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:6057: iyaṃ praśaṃsā praśnabhedapakṣe na ghaṭata ityāha-yatpraśneti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6058: yatpraśnena stutiṃ labdhavāṃstaṃ praśnaṃ vihāya yadyanyamevotthāpayet tarhyanavasare stutīḥ kṛtā syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6063: avidyānāśānantaraṃ brahmatvaṃ cedāgantukamanityaṃ ca syādityata āha-na cāvidyāvattva iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6064: jīvasya brahmatve svābhāvike sati brahmapraśnasya yaduttaraṃ tajjīvapraśnasyāpi bhavatīti lābhaṃ darśayati-tataśca na jāyata iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6082: 'tamasaḥ parastādi'tyādinā śokātyayatamaḥ paratvādibhyaśca mahacchabdaḥ sāṃkhyatattvaṃ nābhidhatta iti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6089: tatkiṃ pradhānaparaṃ māyāparaṃ veti rūḍhyarthāsaṃbhavātsaṃśaye pūrvatrāvyaktaśabdamātreṇa
GSP33brsgor1u:6096: avayavāḥ pradhānasya rajādayasteṣāṃ dharmā rañjakatvādayaḥ tairnimittairlohitādiśabdaiḥ pradhānamucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6110: viśeṣagrahahetoḥ prakaraṇāderabhāvāditi hetuṃ vyākhyāya dṛṣṭāntaṃ vyācaṣṭe-camasavaditi /
GSP33brsgor1u:6114: jyotirupakramā tu tathā hy adhīyata eke / BBs_1,4.9 /
GSP33brsgor1u:6122: kiñca lohitādiśabdairapi dravyalakṣaṇā nyāyyā avyavadhānāt na tu rañjanīyatvādiguṇavyavahitā sattvādiguṇalakṣaṇetyāha-lohitādīnāṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6123: nanu śākhāntareṇa śākhāntarasthamantrasya nirṇayaḥ kathamityata āha-asaṃdigdheneti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6125: yathā śākhāntaravākyānna pradhānagrahastathehāpi śvetāśvataropaniṣadi māyāprakaraṇānna tadbrahma ityāha-tatheti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6127: brahmavādino dhyānākhyayogena paramātmānamanupraviṣṭāḥ santaḥ tatraiva devasyātmabhūtāmaikyenādhyastāṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:6128: śaktiṃ paratantrāṃ māyāṃ sattvādiguṇavatīṃ brahmaṇaḥ sahāyamapaśyannityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6129: māyāyā ekatve 'pi tadaṃśānāṃ jīvopādhīnāṃ tattasaṃghātayonīnāmavidyākhyānāṃ bhedādvīpsā /
GSP33brsgor1u:6156: naca yogasya mukhyavṛttitvāttena pradhānagraho nyāyya iti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:6159: tathāca rohitādiśabdasamabhivyāhārānugṛhītayā rūḍhyāśritayā guṇavṛttyā pradhāne yogaṃ bādhitvāvāntaraprakṛtirajāśabdena grāhya,
GSP33brsgor1u:6160: yathā madhvādiśabdaiḥ prasiddhamadhvādyāśritaguṇalakṣaṇaya ādityādayo gṛhyante tadvat /
GSP33brsgor1u:6164: na saṃkhyopasaṃgrahādapi nānābhāvād atirekāc ca / BBs_1,4.11 /
GSP33brsgor1u:6166: pañcajanaśabdaḥ sāṃkhyatattvaparo 'nyaparo veti yogarūḍhyoraniścayāt saṃśaye yathā
GSP33brsgor1u:6172: tatra catvāraḥ sūtraṃ annaṃ virāṭ tayoḥ kāraṇamavyākṛtamākāśaśca yasminnadhyastāstamevātmānamamṛtaṃ brahma manye /
GSP33brsgor1u:6174: nanvastu pañcatvaśiṣṭeṣu pañcajaneṣu punaḥ pañcatvānvayāt pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyāpratītiḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:6175: tāvatā kathaṃ sāṃkhyatattvagraha ityāśaṅkya saṃkhyāyā dharmyākāṅkṣāyāṃ tattvāni grāhyāṇītyāha-tatheti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6182: pañca tanmātrāśca pañcānāṃ sthūlabhūtānāmākāśādīnāṃ prakṛtayaḥ pañca sthūlabhūtānyekādaśendriyāṇi ceti ṣoḍaśasaṃkhyāko gaṇo vikāra eva na prakṛtiḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:6187: pañcsu pañcasu sādhāraṇasyetarapañcakāddhyāvṛttasya dharmasyābhāvo 'tra nānātvaṃ vivakṣitamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6188: yadyapi jñānakarmendriyeṣu daśasu jñānakaraṇatvaṃ karmakaraṇatvaṃ ca pañcakadvaye 'sti,
GSP33brsgor1u:6190: tathāpi yasminnityātmana ākāśasya ca pṛthagukteḥ sattvarajastamomahadahaṅkārāḥ pañca kartavyāḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:6197: yathā dvāvaśvinau saptarṣayo 'ṣṭau vasavaśceti saptadaśetyatrāśvitvādikamādāya dvitvādayaḥ praviśantiḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6199: pañcaśabdadvayena svavācyanyūnasaṃkhyādvāreṇa tadvyāpyā mahāsaṃkhyaiva lakṣyata iti sadṛṣṭāntaṃ śaṅkate-atheti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6200: mukhyārthasya vakṣyamāṇatvāllakṣaṇā na yukteti pariharati-tadapi neti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6207: tathāca na dvitīyapañcaśabdajanaśabdayoḥ samāsaṃ vināntyasyākārasyodāttatvaṃ pūrveṣāmanudāttatatvaṃ ca ghaṭate 'samāsasya'iti sūtreṇa samāsasyāntodāttavidhānāt
GSP33brsgor1u:6208: 'anudāttaṃ padamekavarjam'iti ca sūtreṇa yasminpade udāttaḥ svarito vā yasya varṇasya
GSP33brsgor1u:6209: vidhīyate tamekaṃ varjayitvāvaśiṣṭaṃ tatpadamanudāttaṃ bhavatīti vidhānādeva māntrikāntodāttasvareṇaikapadatvaniścayaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:6211: yo mantradaśāyāmanudāttaḥ svarito vā sa brāhmaṇadaśāyāmudātto bhavatītyapavāda āśritaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6214: tathā cāntyanakārāduparitana ākāra ākāśaścetyanena śliṣṭatayā paṭhyamāno 'nudātto bhavati,
GSP33brsgor1u:6218: antānudāttaṃ hi samāmnātāraḥ pañcajanaśabdamadhīyata iti pāṭhakaprasiddhirasiddheti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6219: tathā ca pañca pañcajanā iti māntrikāntodāttaḥ svaraḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:6220: yasmin pañca pañcajanā ityantānudātto brāhnasvara iti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6223: ājya, tvā tvāṃ pañcānāṃ pañcajanānāṃ devaviśeṣāṇāṃ yantrāya dhartrāya gṛhṇāmi ityājyagrahaṇamantraśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6224: devatānāṃ karmaṇi yantradavasthitaṃ śarīraṃ tadeva dhartraṃ ihāmitrabhogādhāraṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:6228: janapañcakamekaṃ pañcakānāṃ pañcakaṃ dvitīyamiti pañcakadvayaṃ tasya pañcapañceti grahaṇaṃ netyakṣarārthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6241: pañcānāṃ pūlānāṃ samāhārā ityatra 'saṃkhyāpūrvo dviguḥ'iti samāso vihitaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6242: tato 'dvigoḥ'iti sūtreṇa ṅīpo vidhānāt samāhārapratītau samāhārāḥ katītyākāṅkṣāyāṃ satyāṃ pañcetipadāntarānvayo yuktaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6243: pañcajanā ityatra tu ṅībantatvābhāvena samāhārasyāpratīteḥ janānāṃ cādita eva pañcatvopādānātsaṃkhyākāṅkṣāyā asattvātpañceti padāntaraṃ nānveti
GSP33brsgor1u:6246: nanu janānāṃ nirākāṅkṣatve 'pi tadviśeṣaṇībhūtapañcatvāni katītyākāṅkṣāyāṃ pañcatvāntaraṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavatvityāśaṅkate-bhavadapīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6247: nopasarjanasyopasarjanāntareṇānvayaḥ kintu pradhānenaiveti nopasarjanyāyavirodha ukta iti pariharati-tatra ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6259: kiṃ ca pañcaviṃśatisaṃkhyāpratītāvapi na sāṃkhyatattvānāṃ grahaṇamityāha-kathaṃ ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6264: pañca ca te janāśceti karmadhārayādisamāsāntarātsaṃjñāsamāsasyāptoktyā balavattvaṃ tāvadāha-ucyata iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6265: vigvācinaḥ saṃkhyāvācinaśca śabdāḥ saṃjñāyāṃ gamyamānāyāṃ subantetottarapadena samasyante /
GSP33brsgor1u:6271: pañcajanaśabdasya saṃjñātvamuktvā saṃjñikathanārthaṃ sūtraṃ gṛhṇāti-ke punasta iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6273: ye prāṇādiprerakaṃ tatsākṣiṇamātmānaṃ viduste brahmavida ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6274: pañcajanaśabdasya prāṇādiṣu kayā vṛttyā prayoga iti śaṅkate-kathaṃ punariti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6275: yathā tava tattveṣu janaśabdasya lakṣaṇaya prayogastathā mama prāṇādiṣu pañcajanaśabdasya lakṣaṇayetyāha-tattveṣviti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6283: janakatvājjanaḥ pradhānamiti yogasaṃbhave kimiti rūḍhimāśritya lakṣaṇāprayāsa ityata āha-samāseti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6284: yathā aśvakarṇaśabdasya varṇasamudāyasya vṛkṣe rūḍhirevaṃ pañcajanaśabdasya rūḍhireva nāvayavaśaktyātmako yoga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6288: janasaṃbandhācceti pūrvabhāṣye nareṣu pañcajanaśabdasya rūḍhimāśritya prāṇādiṣu lakṣaṇoktā /
GSP33brsgor1u:6289: iha tu prauḍhivādena prāṇādiṣu rūḍhirucyata iti mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:6294: tataśṭodbhidetyaprasiddhasya tṛtīyāntasya yāgenetyanena prasiddhārthakena sāmānādhikaraṇyena tannāmatvaṃ niścīyate,
GSP33brsgor1u:6297: tathā chinattīti prasiddhārthacchedanayogyārthakaśabdasamabhivyāhārāddāruviśeṣo yūpaśabdārthaḥ karotīti samabhivyāhārādvediśabdārthaḥ saṃskārayogyasthaṇḍilaviśeṣa iti gamyate /
GSP33brsgor1u:6298: tathā prasiddhārtakaprāṇādiśabdasamabhivyāhārāt pañcajanaśabdaḥ prāṇādyarthaka iti niścīyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6302: pāñcajanyayā prajayā viśatīti viṭ tayā viśāpuruṣarūpayendrasyāhvānārthaṃ ghoṣāḥ sṛṣṭā iti yattadyuktaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:6303: ghoṣātirekeṇendrāhvānāyogāditi śrutyanusāreṇa prajāmātragrahe 'pi na virodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6310: jyotiṣāṃ sūryādīnāṃ jyotistadbrahma devā upāsata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6312: tatkāṇvānāṃ pañacatvapūraṇāya gṛhyate nānyeṣāmiti vikalpo na yukta iti śaṅkate-kathaṃ punariti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6314: yathā atirātre ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇāti na gṛhṇāti iti vākyabhedādvikalpastadvacchākhābhedenānnapāṭhāpāṭhābhyāṃ jyotiṣo vikalpa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6315: nanu kriyāyāṃ vikalpo yukto na vastunīti cet /
GSP33brsgor1u:6317: atrāpi śākhāmedena sānnā jyotiḥsahitā vā pañca prāṇādayo yatra pratiṣṭhitāstanmanasānudraṣṭavyamiti dhyānakriyāyāṃ vikalpopapattirityanavadyam
GSP33brsgor1u:6325: adhikaraṇatrayeṇa pradhānasyāśrautatvoktyā jagatkāraṇatvalakṣaṇena brahmaṇa eva buddhisthatā,
GSP33brsgor1u:6326: tasminneva buddhisthe nirviśeṣe brahmaṇi vedāntānāṃ samanvaya iti sādhitaṃ pūrvasūtrasaṃdarbheṇa /
GSP33brsgor1u:6329: na cāvirodhacintāyā dvitīyādhyāye saṃgatirnāsminnadhyāya iti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:6331: tatpadavācyajagatkāraṇavādiśrutīnāṃ mitho virodhādvācyārthānirṇayena lakṣye samanvayāsiddhau prāptāyāṃ tatsādhakāvirodhacintāyā atraiva saṃgatatvāt
GSP33brsgor1u:6332: na caivaṃ sṛṣṭiśrutīnāmapyavirodho 'traiva cintanīya iti vācyam,
GSP33brsgor1u:6336: iha tu sūkṣmadṛśāṃ vākyārthe samanvayajñānāya tatpadārthaśrutivirodhaḥ parihriyate /
GSP33brsgor1u:6337: tadyapi tvaṃpadārthaśrutivirodho 'tra parihartavyaḥ tathāpi prathamasūtreṇa bandhamithyātvasūcanādavirodhaḥ siddhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6340: tāḥ kiṃ brahmaṇi mānaṃ na veti saṃśaye 'nnajyotiṣoḥ saṃkhyādṛṣṭikriyāyāṃ vikalpe
GSP33brsgor1u:6367: tadidaṃ jagaddha kila tarhi prākkāle 'vyākṛtaṃ kāraṇātmakāmāsīt /
GSP33brsgor1u:6370: tatra sṛṣṭau virodhamaṅgīkṛtya sraṣṭari virodhaṃ pariharati-satyapīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6371: ākāśādiṣu brahmaṇaḥ kāraṇatve virodho naivāstīti pratijñāyāṃ hetumāha-kuta iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6379: yathā taittirīyake sarvajñatvādikaṃ kāraṇasya tathā chāndogyādāvapi dṛśyata ityāha-tadatra yallakṣaṇamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6382: tathāpi kārye virodhātkāraṇe 'pi virodhaḥ syādityāśaṅkya niṣedhati-kāryaviṣayaṃ tvityādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:6383: svapnasṛṣṭīnāṃ pratyahamanyathātvena so 'hamiti pratyabhijñāyamāne draṣṭaryapi nānātvaṃ prasajyetetyāha-atiprasaṅgāditi /
GSP33brsgor1u:6391: śuṅgena kāryeṇa liṅgena kāraṇabrahmajñānārthatvaṃ sṛṣṭiśrutīnāmuktvā kāraṇasyādvayatvajñānaṃ phalāntamāha-mṛdādīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6392: evaṃ niṣphalāyāmanyārthāyāṃ sṛṣṭau tātparyābhāvādvirodho na doṣa ityatra vṛddhasaṃmatimāha-tathāceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6403: evaṃ sṛṣṭidvārakaṃ virodhamutsūtraṃ samādhāya kāraṇasya sadasattvādinā sākṣācchrutivirodhanirāsārthaṃ sūtramādatte-yatpunariti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6405: ato 'tra śloke nirātmakamasanna śrāvyata iti yojanā /
GSP33brsgor1u:6406: tat tatra sadātmani śloko mantro bhavati /
GSP33brsgor1u:6416: śūnyanirāsena śrutibhiḥ sadvādasyaiveṣṭatvāttāsāṃ virodhasphūrtinirāsāya lakṣaṇā yukteti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6420: nanu kartrabhāva eva parāmṛśyata ityata āha-cetanasya cāyamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6428: nanu karmakārakādanyasya kartuḥ sattve karmaṇa eva kartṛvācilakāro viruddha ityata āha-vyākriyata iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6431: vyākriyate jagatsvayameva niṣpannamiti vyākhyāya kenacidvyākṛtamiti vyācaṣṭe-yadveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6438: balākāyā apatyaṃ bālākirbrāhmaṇastaṃ prati rājovāca-yo vā iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6439: na kevalamādityādīnāṃ kartā kintu sarvasya jagata ityāha-yasyeti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6444: iha tu vākyabhedāt 'brahma te bravāṇi'iti bālākivākyasthabrahmaśabdena prāṇādiśabdo brahmaparatvena netumāśakya iti pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣamāha--kiṃ tāvaditi /
GSP33brsgor1u:6445: pūrvapakṣe vākyasya prāṇādyupāstiparatvādbrahmaṇi samanvayāsiddhiḥ siddhānte jñeye samanvayasiddhiriti phalam /
GSP33brsgor1u:6448: śrutaṃ puruṣakartṛtvaṃ prāṇasya kathamityata āha-ye caita iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6449: sūtrātmakaprāṇasya vikāraḥ sūryādaya ityatra mānamāha-kratama iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6450: yasya mahimānaḥ sarve devā iti pūrvavākye darśitaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:6456: yatkāraṇaṃ yasmājjīvaṃ bodhayati tasmādasti suptotthāpanaṃ jīvaliṅgamiti yojanā /
GSP33brsgor1u:6458: taṃ rājā he bṛhatpāṇḍaravāsaḥ somarājannityāmantrya saṃbodhya saṃbodhanānabhijñatvāt prāṇāderanātmatvamuktvā yaṣṭhyāghātenotthāpya jīvaṃ bodhitavānityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:6459: śroṣṭhī pradhānaḥ svairbhṛtyairjñātibhirupahṛtaṃ bhuṅkte svāḥ jñātayaśca tamupajīvanti,
GSP33brsgor1u:6460: evaṃ jīvo 'pi ādityādibhiḥ prakāśādinā bhogopakaraṇairbhuṅkte te ca havirgrahaṇādinā jīvamupajīvantītyuktaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ jīvaliṅgam /
GSP33brsgor1u:6461: nanu 'prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati'iti śrutaḥ prāṇaśabdo jīve kathamityata āha-prāṇabhṛttvācceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6463: sa ca bālākirbrahmatvabhrāntyā vyaṣṭiliṅgarūpānpuruṣānuktvā rājñā nirastastūṣṇīṃ sthitaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6464: tvaduktaṃ brahma mṛṣetyuktvā rājñocyamānaṃ brahmaiveti vaktavyamanyathārājño 'pi mṛṣāvāditvaprasaṅgādityāha-yadi so 'pīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6471: atra prakaraṇopapadayorasattvātkasya grahaṇamiti saṃśaye puruṣakartṛpadasāṃnidhyāt kriyata iti yogājjagadgrahaṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6474: nanu puruṣotpādakasya karturvyāpāraḥ karotyarthaṃ utpādanaṃ tasyaphalaṃ puruṣajanma tadanyataravācī karmaśabdo 'stvityata āha-nāpīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6480: atra ca saṃkocakāsattvātsarvārthakena sarvanāmnā buddhisthasya kāryamātrasya karmaśabdo vācaka ityāha-tathāpīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6485: brāhmaṇā bhojayitavyāḥ parivrājakāścetyatra yathā brahmaṇaśabdaḥ parivrājakānyaviṣayaḥ tathātra karmaśabdaḥ puruṣānyajagadvācītyāha-evamiti
GSP33brsgor1u:6496: 'saṃbhavatyekavākyatve vākyabhedo hi neṣyate'ityuktaṃ cet punaruktiḥ syāditi śaṅkate-nanvevamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6497: karmapadasya rūḍhyā pūrvapakṣaprāptau tannirāsārthamasyārambho yukta ityāha-netyādinā /
GSP33brsgor1u:6502: anyārthaṃ tu jaiminiḥ praśnavyākhyānābhyām api caivam eke / BBs_1,4.18 /
GSP33brsgor1u:6506: he bālāke, etacchayanaṃ viśeṣajñānābhāvarūpaṃ yathā syāttathaiṣa puruṣaḥ kvāśayiṣṭa /
GSP33brsgor1u:6509: etadbhavanamekībhāvarūpaṃ yathā syāttathā eṣa puruṣaḥ kvābhūtsuptaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6512: etadāgamanamaikyabhraṃśarūpaṃ yathā syāttathā puruṣaḥ kuta āgata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6515: uttare prāṇokteḥ praśno 'pi prāṇaviśaya ityata āha-suṣuptikāle ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6522: nanu tatrākāśaḥ suṣuptisthānamuktaṃ na brahmetyata āha-ākāśeti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6524: evaṃ jīvanirāsārthakatvena sūtraṃ vyākhyāya prāṇanirāsaparatvenāpi vyācaṣṭe-prāṇeti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6527: api caike śākhina evameva prāṇātiriktaṃ jīvātmānamāmanantaḥ prāṇasya vākyārthatvaṃ vārayantīti sūtrayojanā /
GSP33brsgor1u:6541: yathā 'brahma te bravāṇi'ityupakramabalādvākyasya brahmaparatvaṃ tathātra jīvopakramādasya vākyasya jīvaparatvamiti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣayati-kiṃ tāvaditi /
GSP33brsgor1u:6543: siddhānte jñeye pratyagbrahmaṇi samanvaya iti phalam /
GSP33brsgor1u:6549: etebhyaḥkāryakāraṇātmanā jāyamānebhyo bhūtebhayaḥ sāmyenotthāya bhūtopādhikaṃ janmānubhūya tānyeva bhūtāni nīyamānānyanusṛtya vinaśyati /
GSP33brsgor1u:6559: yathā dundubhiśaṅkhavīṇāśabdasāmānyagrahaṇenaiva gṛhyamāṇāstadavāntaraviśeṣāḥ śuktigrahaṇagrāhyarajatavat sāmānye kalpitāstato na bhidyante,
GSP33brsgor1u:6565: ayaṃ ca lokaḥ paraśca loka iti rūpam /
GSP33brsgor1u:6566: kiñca 'sa yathā sarvāsāmapāṃ samudra ekāyanam'iti kaṇḍikayā sarvaprapañcasya mukhyalayādhāratvamātmano brahmatve liṅgamityāha-tathaivaikāyaneti
GSP33brsgor1u:6573: utkramiṣyata evaṃ bhāvād ity auḍulomiḥ / BBs_1,4.21 /
GSP33brsgor1u:6578: nanu saṃsārasyaupādhikatvāt sarvadaivābheda ityāśaṅkya dṛṣṭāntabalena saṃsārasya svābhāvikatvamityāha-kvacicceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6579: 'yathā nadyaḥ syandamānāḥ samudrestaṃ gacchanti nāmarūpe vihāya'iti nadinidarśanaṃ vyācaṣṭe-yathā loke iti //21//
GSP33brsgor1u:6584: atyantābhedajñāpanārthaṃ jīvamupakramya draṣṭavyatvādayo brahmadharmā uktā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6590: jīvoddeśena brahmatvapratipādane bhedo 'pyāvaśyaka iti bhedābhedaśaṅkāprāptau kalpitabhedenoddeśyatvādikaṃ svato 'tyantābheda iti jñāpanārthamasyārambhāt
GSP33brsgor1u:6591: jñāpane cātra liṅgamātmaśabdenopakrāntasya jīvasya dharmiṇo brahmaṇo dharmyantarasya grahaṇaṃ vinaiva brahmadharmakathanaṃ bhedābhede dharmidvayagrahaḥ syāditi mantavyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:6593: sarvāṇi rūpāṇi kāryāṇi vicitya sṛṣṭvā teṣaṃ nāmāni ca kṛtvā teṣu buddhyādiṣu praviśyābhivadanādikaṃ
GSP33brsgor1u:6594: kurvan yo vartate tadvidvānihaivāmṛto bhavatīti mantro 'pi jīvaparayoraikyaṃ darśayatītyāha-mantreti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6604: kalpitasya bhedasya jñānānnivṛttiḥ saṃbhavati na satyasyetyapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brsgor1u:6608: utpattiśrutyā jīvasya brahmaṇā bhedābhedāvityata āha-ata eveti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6610: atra pūrvapakṣe bījatrayamuktaṃ jīvenopakramaḥ parasyaiva samutthānaśrutyā jīvābhedābhidhānaṃ vijñātṛśabdaśceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6613: ātmajñānātsarvavijñānaṃ yatpratijñātaṃ tatra hetuḥ 'idaṃ sarvaṃ yadayamātmā'ityavyatireka uktastasya pratipādanāttadeva pratijñātamupapāditamiti yojanā /
GSP33brsgor1u:6618: mṛtasya saṃjñā nāstīti vākye 'traiva māṃ mohitavānasi jñānarūpasyātmano jñānābhāve nāśaprasaṅgāditi maitreyyokto munirāha-na vā are iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6624: kāśakṛtsnasya mate tvatyantābhedādvijñānasya kārakābhāvātsa yukta iti śrutyanusāritvāttanmate
GSP33brsgor1u:6625: manaḥkalpitaṃ vijñātṛtvaṃ mukte brahmātmani bhūtapūrvagatyoktamiti pariharaṇīyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6626: kiñca pūrvāparaparyālocanayā vākyasya muktātmaparatvāvagamādvijñātṛtvaṃ kalpitamevānūdyata iti na talliṅgena jīvaparatvamityāha-api ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6631: hetūnāṃ bhedo na paramārthika iti pratijñayā saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6632: bhedābhedapakṣe jīvasya janmādivikāravattvāttanniṣedho na syādityāha-sa vā eṣa iti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6633: bhedasya satyatve tatpramayā bādhādahaṃ brahmeti nirvādhaṃ jñānaṃ na syādityāha-anyathāceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6637: ātyantikaikatve hi prajñā pratiṣṭhitā bhavati na bhedābhedayoriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6647: nanvekasyāṃ guhāyāṃ dvau kiṃ na syātāmityata āha-naceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6649: nanvatyantābhede jīvasya spaṣṭabhānādbrahmāpi spaṣṭaṃ syādataḥ spaṣṭatvāspaṣṭatvābhyāṃ tayorbheda iti cet / na /
GSP33brsgor1u:6650: darpaṇe pratibimbasya sphuṭatve 'pi bimbasyāsphuṭatvavat kalpitabhedena viruddhadharmavyavasthopapatteḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6652: so 'yamitivattattvamasītyakāryakāraṇadravyasāmānādhikaraṇyādatyantābhedo vedāntārthastadbodha eva niḥśreyasasādhanaṃ tasya bādho na yukta ityarthaḥ
GSP33brsgor1u:6653: kiñca bhedābhadavādino jñānakarmabhyāṃ kṛtakaṃ mokṣaṃ kalpayanti,
GSP33brsgor1u:6657: asmākaṃ tvanarthadhvaṃsasya jñānasādhyatvānnityamuktātmamātratvācca nānityatvadoṣa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6664: tatra hi brahmaṇo buddhisthatvārthaṃ sāmānyato jagatkāraṇatvaṃ lakṣaṇamuktaṃ,
GSP33brsgor1u:6665: tena buddhisthe brahmaṇi kṛtasnavedāntasamanvayaṃ pratipādya tatkāraṇatvaṃ kiṃ kartṛtvamātramuta prakṛtitvakartṛtvobhayarūpamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6668: yadyapi tadānantaryamasya yuktaṃ tathāpi niścitatātparyairvedāntaiḥ kartṛmātreśvaramatanirāsaḥ sukara iti samanvayānte idaṃ likhitam /
GSP33brsgor1u:6697: kartṛjñānādapi sarvakāryajñānaṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-nimittakāraṇāvyatirekastviti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6699: vāgārabhyaṃ nāmamātraṃ vikāro na vastuto 'stīti satyakāraṇajñānādvikārajñānaṃ yuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6702: ghaṭaḥ sphuratītyanugatasphuraṇaṃ prakṛtistadatirikeṇa vikārā na santīti so 'yamartho yathā sphuṭaḥ tathā dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa ucyate /
GSP33brsgor1u:6703: hanyamānadundubhijanyācchabdasāmānyādbāhyān viśeṣaśabdān sāmānyagrahaṇātirikeṇa pṛthaggrahītuṃ śrotā na śaknuyāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:6704: sāmānyasya tu grahaṇena dundubhyāghātajaśabdaviśeṣo gṛhīto bhavati,
GSP33brsgor1u:6705: tasya vā grahaṇena tadavāntaraviśeṣaśabdo gṛhīto bhavati /
GSP33brsgor1u:6706: ataḥ śabdasāmānyagrahaṇagrahyā viśeṣāḥ sāmānye kalpitāḥ tadvadātmabhānabhāsyā ghaṭādaya ātmani kalpitā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6708: 'yato vā'ityatra śrutau yata iti pañcamī prakṛtau draṣṭavyetyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6711: evaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtitvaṃ prasādhya kartṛtvaṃ sādhayati-nimittatvamiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6731: nanu kṛterāśrayaḥsiddhobhavati viṣayastu sādhya ityekasyobhayaṃ viruddhamityāśaṅkate-kathaṃ punariti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6732: yathā mṛdaḥ sādhyapariṇāmābhedena kṛtiviṣayatvaṃ tadvadātmana ityāha-pariṇāmāditi /
GSP33brsgor1u:6736: nanu brahmaṇa ātmānamiti dvitīyayā kāryātmanā sādhyatvaśrutyāstu prakṛtitvaṃ kartā tvanyo 'stvityata āha-svayamiti ceti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6737: brahmaṇaḥ kṛtikarmatvopapādanārthaṃ pariṇāmāditi padaṃ vyākhyāyānyathāpi vyācaṣṭe-pṛthaksūtramiti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6738: mṛdghaṭa itivadbrahma sacca tyacceti pariṇāmasāmānādhikaraṇyaśruterbrahmaṇaḥ prakṛtitvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6756: nanvanupādāne 'pi strīyonau yoniśabdo dṛṣṭa ityata āha-strīyoneriti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6758: yoniśabdasya sthānamapyartho bhavati so 'tra bhūtayonyādiśabdairna grāhyaḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:6760: he indra, te tava niṣade upaveśanāya yoniḥ,
GSP33brsgor1u:6763: nanvanumānasya śrutyanapekṣatvānna tayā bādha ityata āha-nahīti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6765: yā kṛtiḥ sā śarīrajanyeti vyāptivirodhena nityakṛtimato 'numānāsaṃbhavāt /
GSP33brsgor1u:6766: ataḥ śrautamīśvaraṃ pakṣīkṛtyānupādānatvasādhane bhavatyevopajīvyayā prakṛtitvabodhakaśrutyā bādha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsgor1u:6770: ata ubhayarūpaṃ kāraṇatvaṃ brahmaṇo lakṣaṇamiti siddhām //27//
GSP33brsgor1u:6780: tathā hi chāndogye jagatkāraṇatvajñāpanārthaṃ pitā putramuvāca,
GSP33brsgor1u:6783: punaḥ pitrā kimatra paśyasītyukte na kiñcana bhagava ityāha /
GSP33brsgor1u:6788: atrāṇvādivādāḥ śrautā na veti saṃśaye satyasadaṇvādiśabdabalācchrautā iti prāpte 'tidiśati-eteneti /
GSP33brsgor1u:6794: tasminnaiva sarveṣāṃ vedāntānāṃ samanvaya iti siddham //28//
GSP33brsgor1u:6796: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatpādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsāvyākhyāyāṃ bhāṣyaratnaprabhāyāṃ prathamādhyāyasya yaturthaḥ pādaḥ //4//
